title: Captain America’s Shield SUCKS! (Marvel) #shorts
description:
Let’s be honest, Captain America’s shield makes NO sense! Of course, there’s no way it can bounce around and always return to Steve Rogers like a boomerang. But, more importantly, in the canon of the MCU the shield bounce shouldn’t work with a material like vibranium!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee, Eddie “NostalGamer” Robinson, and Ash
Editor: Shnaia "Naya" Llamera
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
